item.title: Hello, I'm Silas
item.description: My interests include: Distributed systems Crows Jessica Metcalfe Cryptography Maths Crossfit Running Hooks Gymnastics Trees I work at Monax where I work on cryptographically verifiable, decentralised, smart contract systems and consensus networks. The artist formerly known as blockchain. You can reach me at any email address of this domain. My CV can be found here.
